fullText: Linda Lavin gives a performance of towering strength and complexity as Ruth Steiner, the writing teacher who becomes both mentor and monster to her gifted student.
dtliExcerpt: Linda Lavin gives a performance of towering strength and complexity as Ruth Steiner, the writing teacher who becomes both mentor and monster to her gifted student.
